remarks: Function-builder for derivative, finite sums rule.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Nov-2014.)
statement:
dvmptfsum.j $e |- J = ( K |`t S ) $.
dvmptfsum.k $e |- K = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
dvmptfsum.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvmptfsum.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. J ) $.
dvmptfsum.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. Fin ) $.
dvmptfsum.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. I /\ x e. X ) -> A e. CC ) $.
dvmptfsum.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. I /\ x e. X ) -> B e. CC ) $.
dvmptfsum.d $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. I ) -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> A ) ) = ( x e. X |-> B ) ) $.
dvmptfsum $p |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> sum_ i e. I A ) ) = ( x e. X |-> sum_ i e. I B ) ) $.
$d I i x $.
$d S i x $.
$d X i x $.
$d i ph x $.
